data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Hiroshima's Tsukasa Morishima breaks free at EDION Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 1, Yudai Yamamoto awards Tosu a goal kick.
Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tosu have a goal kick.
In the minute 4, Yudai Yamamoto awards the home team a throw-in.
Hiroshima are pushing forward but Tsukasa Morishima's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Hiroshima.
In the minute 5, Tosu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a throw-in for Hiroshima, close to Tosu's area.
Throw-in for Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 8, Can Hiroshima capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Goal kick for Tosu at EDION Stadium.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Yudai Yamamoto.
In the minute 11, Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Hiroshima.
Ball goes out of play for a Tosu goal kick.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 16, In Hiroshima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Hiroshima's Hayao Kawabe gets in a shot on goal at EDION Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Goal kick for Tosu at EDION Stadium.
In the minute 19, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Tosu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
In the minute 21, Yuya Asano puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
In the minute 25, Yudai Yamamoto signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Tosu's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Hiroshima.
Free kick Tosu.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 27, Yuki Nogami (Hiroshima) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
In the minute 29, Hiroshima's Yuya Asano misses with an attempt on goal.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Yudai Yamamoto.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Tosu.
Hiroshima are coming forward and Yusuke Chajima gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Yudai Yamamoto awards Tosu a goal kick.
In the minute 32, Tosu have a goal kick.
Free kick for Tosu in the half of Hiroshima.
Throw-in Hiroshima.
In the minute 35, In Hiroshima a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Tosu capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hiroshima's half?
Corner awarded to Tosu.
In the minute 38, Can Tosu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
Tosu have a goal kick.
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 40, Yudai Yamamoto awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Tosu in the half of Hiroshima.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 44, Yudai Yamamoto awards Tosu a goal kick.
Throw-in for Tosu at EDION Stadium.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Hiroshima.
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Goal! Hiroshima extend their lead to 2-0 through Shunki Higashi.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at EDION Stadium.
Hiroshima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 46, Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Tosu territory.
The away team have replaced An Yong-Woo with Ryoya Morishita. This is the first substitution made today by Myung Hwi Kim.
Myung Hwi Kim (Tosu) is making a second substitution, with Riki Harakawa replacing Ryang Yong-Gi.
In the minute 46, Myung Hwi Kim is making the team's third substitution at EDION Stadium with Fuchi Honda replacing Jeong-su Park.
Teruki Hara is replacing Yuzo Kobayashi for Tosu at EDION Stadium.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Tosu just outside Hiroshima's area.
Riki Harakawa of Tosu gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 48, Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
Throw-in Hiroshima.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 51, At EDION Stadium, Fuchi Honda has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Tosu will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Hiroshima.
In Hiroshima Tosu attack through Tomoya Koyamatsu. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 53, It's a goal kick for the home team in Hiroshima.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tsukasa Morishima for Hiroshima drives towards goal at EDION Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 56, Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Yudai Yamamoto.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Hiroshima.
Toshihiro Aoyama puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-0.
In the minute 59, Hiroshima advance rapidly upfield but Yudai Yamamoto blows for offside.
Tosu to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
Goal kick for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
In the minute 62, Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fuchi Honda gets his shot on target but fails to score for Tosu.
Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
In the minute 67, Douglas Vieira is replacing Yuya Asano for the home team.
Yoshifumi Kashiwa is replacing Yusuke Chajima for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
Throw-in for Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 70, Hiroshima are coming forward and Shunki Higashi gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Throw-in for Tosu at EDION Stadium.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 73, Yudai Yamamoto awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
Douglas Vieira of Hiroshima gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 78, Goal kick for Tosu at EDION Stadium.
Ball safe as Tosu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The home team replace Ryo Nagai with Ezequiel.
In the minute 80, Hiroshi Jofuku is making the team's fourth substitution at EDION Stadium with Kodai Dohi replacing Toshihiro Aoyama.
Tosu needs to be cautious. Hiroshima have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 81, Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tosu's half?
Tosu make their fifth substitution with Yohei Toyoda replacing Tomoya Koyamatsu.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 86, Leandro Pereira is on a sub for Tsukasa Morishima for Hiroshima.
In Hiroshima Hiroshima drive forward through Leandro Pereira. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Yudai Yamamoto will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Hiroshima are pushing forward but Ezequiel's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Hiroshima.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tosu's Yohei Toyoda is whistled for offside at EDION Stadium.
Yudai Yamamoto signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Tosu's half.
Free kick Hiroshima.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 3-0.
